column1: Name / Purpose
[title_desc name="Half-Life Model Viewer (original HLMV)" desc="View and Adjust Models before taking into the Engine" /]

[title_desc name="Crowbar" desc="Decompile, Compile, and View Source-Engine & GoldSrc Models in a Convenient Interface" home_link="http://steamcommunity.com/groups/CrowbarTool"/]
[title_desc name="Doggs MDL Compiler" desc="GUI frontend for studiomdl" /]
[title_desc name="Dvondrake's SMD exporter for Blender" desc="Export SMDs from blender" /]
[title_desc name="Gmax" desc="Watered down free version of 3dsmax" /]
[title_desc name="GUI Studio MDL" desc="GUI frontend for studiomdl" /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life EZ Weapon Creator" desc="Creates almost all of the code required to add new weapons into Half-Life" /]
[title_desc name="Hl2 compile toolkit" desc="Toolkit to aid in the compilation of models for Source games" /]
[title_desc name="IOgre Cinema4d to Source" desc="Cinema4D Source plugins" /]

[title_desc name="MDL Decompiler" desc="Decompile MDL files back into SMD files" /]
[title_desc name="MDL Texture Info" desc="Display the material information associated with a model" /]

[title_desc name="Modo to SMD" desc="Export Modo files as SMD" /]
[title_desc name="Model Generator (MOG)" desc="Convert OBJ, BSP & VMF to OBJ or SMD" /]

[title_desc name="OBJ2SMD Converter" desc="simple converter that makes an OBJ an SMD" /]

[title_desc name="Pretador's Model Compiler - QC Editor" desc="View useful information in QC files" /]

[title_desc name="QC Editor - Compiler Advanced Edition" desc="QC compiler and editor" /]
[title_desc name="QC Mann" desc="helps automate the creation of QC files" /]
[title_desc name="QME" desc="This is a model viewer for Quake 1. Once a paid program, it became freeware in 2006." /]
[title_desc name="Softimage/XSI Mod Tool" desc="Now a discontinued tool Softimage was once at the forefront of 3D Content creation, The modtool was provided for free." /]
[title_desc name="Source Model Finder" desc="This program helps find models for Source mappers." /]
[title_desc name="Source Studio" desc="Cannonfodders decompiler and compiler for source" /]
[title_desc name="SourceEyeCalc" desc="Nifty tool to help calculate the position of eyes for a model" /]
[title_desc name="Studio Model Tool - Nightfire" desc="Plugin for NightFire Workshop" /]
[title_desc name="Valve Source Addon for XSI" desc="Official Addon for Softimage" /]
[title_desc name="Valve Tools" desc="Small collection of model tools for use with the Valve Engines" /]
[title_desc name="VMFtoSMD" desc="convert VMF map files to SMD geometry files" /]
[title_desc name="WallWorm Tools" desc="Wallworm Tools for exporting and importing for 3dsmax" /]
[title_desc name="zModeler" desc="3d modeling application" /]
[title_desc name=Rantis Extended Valve Tools" desc="A Maya based sequence extractor" /]
[title_desc name="Otis' Half-life Modelviewer" desc="A model viewer that can open any HL model and view animations, zoom, etc." /]
[title_desc name="MDLFlip" desc="and allows you to flip individual animation smd's" /]
[title_desc name="gFlip" desc="and allows you to flip individual animation smd's" /]
[title_desc name="Treed" desc="an easy to use tree generator!" /]

[title_desc name="Source to GoldSrc SMD Converter" desc="This is designed as a substitute for Milkshape in the process of bringing a model from Blender (with the SMD Tools plugin) into Half-Life 1 and Goldsrc based mods. It should also be useful for Source .smds exported from other tools, and is by no means Blender specific." /]
[title_desc name="MDL Gui" desc="A GUI for Goldsrc MDL compilation and decompilation." /]

[title_desc name="Community Updated HLMV" desc="Half-Life Model Viewer is a brand new tool based on HLMV 1.25 and Jed's Model Viewer 1.36 that provides an entirely rebuilt model viewer." home_link="https://github.com/SamVanheer/HL_Tools/wiki/Half-Life-Model-Viewer" /]
[title_desc name="Jigglebone QCGen" desc="Helps in the model decompile process." /]
[title_desc name="VTA Apply" desc="This application allows you to apply VTA animations to SMD model files." /]
[title_desc name="Sven Coop StudioMdl" desc="modernized studiomdl.exe" home_link="https://forums.svencoop.com/showthread.php/45003-StudioMDL-with-Texture-Shifting-fix" /]

[title_desc name="DoomMusics StudioMdl" desc="improved StudioMdl" /]
[title_desc name="3DS Max SMD and DMX Plugins" desc="Collection of up to date plugins for 3dsmax and Valve\'s engines" home_link="https://forum.facepunch.com/f/fbx/qxgb/3DS-Max-SMD-Plugins/1/" /]
